name: Dungeness 2: Pizza Delivery
description:
A sequel/spinoff to the original Sir Dungeness game: this game sees him going from glorious knight to .......deliveryman!? But that does not man that the TVs are not upset after the murder of their god (and working as drones for competing companies to repair their lair.). Join Sir Dungeness as he fulfills his destiny and earns his paycheck!

Uses the WASD to move, mouse to aim. Left click to use your breadstick, right click to throw your pizzas. Be sure to make your pizzas delivery fast before the TVs stop you.

If your pizza gets stuck, press the E button to get your pizzas back!

Credits:

Ben Odrich - Programmer

Alec Jakopin - Programmer

Ziad Mohammed - Programmer, Artist, SFX

Olivia LaValley - Level Designer, Composer
